ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kunark Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: THey are fighting in K Castle (Kunor? I forget exactlY) Sentrys and skeleton types. ANd yes, she has her AC not her charisma set on. I remember her mentioning
ygData.messageBody:
THey are fighting in K Castle (Kunor? I forget exactlY) Sentrys and skeleton
types. ANd yes, she has her AC not her charisma set on. I remember her
mentioning
that last night.

>-----Original Message-----
>From: illianj@... [mailto:illianj@...]On Behalf
>Of Jeff Illian
>Sent: Wednesday, April 26, 2000 11:56 AM

>I've been using the chant series like CRAZY in Kunark with almost
>0 resists. On the other hand, the few
>times I've whipped out my Kisch, I think I've had 100% resists
>against its poison proc (which is almost
>never resisted on Antonica). Perhaps it is the type of the Kunark
>mob you are fighting? Perhaps too it
>is charisma related. Currently I'm up to a whopping 160 unbuffed now.

>"Perhaps a Princess..." wrote:
>
>> You are very lucky. Windsong (I look over her shoulder)
>> was getting almost constant resists last night. Two
>> I can think of in particular are Chant and Pixie
>> Strike
